import {React, useState} from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', pass: '', cpass: '' }) let keyname, valuename; const handleInputs = (e)=> { console.log(user) keyname = e.target.name valuename = e.target.value setUser({... user, [keyname]: valuename}) } const postData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("Register CLicked") const {fn, ln, eml, phn, pas, cpas} = user; window.alert(user.firstName) const res = await fetch("/register", { method : 'POST', headers : {"content-type" : "application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify({ 'firstName': "a", 'lastName': "b", 'email': "eml", 'phone': "phn", 'password': "pas", 'cpassword': "pas" }) }) const data = await res.json() if (res.status === 422 || !data){ console.log("Error") window.alert("Failed") } else if (res.status === 201){ console.log("Successful") window.alert("Successful") } } return (

Sign Up

) } export default Register
